title: What is the structure of the Task Manager screen?
answer: ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110902) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110903) The running applications are listed on the Task Manager screen. [The clear button ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110904) is on the bottom. ]()
